name: Fleeing Saucer
description:
You're a Fleeing Saucer on the run from some angry-looking spaceships! Defend your craft while you make your escape!

This was made for the Opera GX game jam a while back, and was just sitting on Game Jolt. It's here on Itch too now.

(Don't mind that the copyright still says GT Games, the GameMaker HTML license expired so it can't exactly be changed at the moment)
